They probably have a scientific advisor called shane or whatnot.


Writer: Shane, I propose we have SG1 travel through time by the power of farts.

Shane: that wont work.

Writer: screw you.



The above scneario probably happens a lot, ie the advisor gives advice, but in the end its upto the writers what they want and what they dont want.


As for how exactly its written, I know that in trek they used to leave out gaps for technobabble, and then it would be written in later by someone who was either good at it or reallllly reallllly bad at it.
